tool.name: SAGA.imagery_classification.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRIDS True isArrayTRAINING False isArrayTRAINING_CLASS False isArrayFILE_LOAD False isArrayFILE_SAVE False output_data_CLASSES $output_data_CLASSES output_data_QUALITY $output_data_QUALITY name SAGA.imagery_classification.0 GRIDS $GRIDS NORMALISE $NORMALISE TRAINING $TRAINING TRAINING_CLASS $TRAINING_CLASS FILE_LOAD $FILE_LOAD FILE_SAVE $FILE_SAVE METHOD $METHOD THRESHOLD_DIST $THRESHOLD_DIST THRESHOLD_ANGLE $THRESHOLD_ANGLE THRESHOLD_PROB $THRESHOLD_PROB RELATIVE_PROB $RELATIVE_PROB WTA_0 $WTA_0 WTA_1 $WTA_1 WTA_2 $WTA_2 WTA_3 $WTA_3 WTA_4 $WTA_4 WTA_5 $WTA_5 RGB_COLORS $RGB_COLORS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.outputType_CLASSES transmissionMode_CLASSES $OutputSection_CLASSES.transmissionMode_CLASSES outputType_QUALITY $OutputSection_QUALITY.outputType_QUALITY transmissionMode_QUALITY $OutputSection_QUALITY.transmissionMode_QUALITY

param.name: GRIDS
param.label: Features
param.help: Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi

param.name: TRAINING
param.label: Training Areas
param.help: Training Areas The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: TRAINING_CLASS
param.label: Class Identifier
param.help: Class Identifier The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FILE_LOAD
param.label: Load Statistics from File...
param.help: Load Statistics from File... The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: FILE_SAVE
param.label: Save Statistics to File...
param.help: Save Statistics to File... The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: THRESHOLD_DIST
param.label: Distance Threshold
param.help: Let pixel stay unclassified, if minimum euclidian or mahalanobis distance is greater than threshold.

param.name: THRESHOLD_ANGLE
param.label: Spectral Angle Threshold (Degree)
param.help: Let pixel stay unclassified, if spectral angle distance is greater than threshold.

param.name: THRESHOLD_PROB
param.label: Probability Threshold
param.help: Let pixel stay unclassified, if maximum likelihood probability value is less than threshold.

param.name: RGB_COLORS
param.label: Update Colors from Features
param.help: Use the first three features in list to obtain blue, green, red components for class colour in look-up table.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CLASSES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CLASSES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_QUALITY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_QUALITY
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
